Package ohos.aafwk.ability

Interface ILifecycle

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Ability, AbilitySlice, AccessibleAbility, AceAbility, AVBrowserService, Fraction, FractionAbility, HostService, InputMethodAbility, IntentAbility, OffHostService, WorkScheduler

    public interface ILifecycle
    Generates a Lifecycle object. Each Ability or AbilitySlice, which has a lifecycle, must implement this interface to generate its own Lifecycle object. Lifecycle observers then observe Lifecycle objects and receive notifications upon lifecycle changes.
    Since:
    1
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Aafwk#ABILITY

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Lifecycle getLifecycle​()
      Obtains the Lifecycle object of an Ability or AbilitySlice.
